name: AHAB
description:
CONTROLS

WASDMove
BackspacePull LineSpaceReel LineUp ArrowHold Line

"It's the Dark Souls Kelly Slater of fishing games." - B Man

Beach a submerged ocean giant using only your rod and determination.   Can you catch the big one?

Made over the span of four days, "AHAB" is my exploration of the 2021 District June Jam theme "Emergence".

Herman Melville's Moby-Dick released in 1851, 170 years, or 10 Brood X cycles ago.

Soundtrack
- Beethoven's Piano Sonata No. 8 "Pathtique" in C Minor, arrangement by HertzDevil
- Mozart's Lacrimosa Requiem, arrangement by 8-Bit Industry

Programming, Sound Effects, Art
- Craig Hamilton (Craigory Ham)

v0.0.6.1

*Cleaned up and enhanced GUI elements
*Added new font
*Fixed bug that crashes when wave hits a player and the fish is caught or lost
*Fixed wave depth
